titles.title: High Rise Fire Sprinkler Incentive Act of 2021
High Rise Fire Sprinkler Incentive Act of 2021
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to classify certain automatic fire sprinkler system retrofits as 15-year property for purposes of depreciation.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
High Rise Fire Sprinkler Incentive Act of 2021
This bill classifies any automatic fire sprinkler system retrofit property as 15-year property for purposes of accelerated depreciation.
